typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> DataLakeSource
DataLakeSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
RenameColumns filter(toInteger(year)>1950) ~> FilterDate
FilterDate derive(PrimaryGenre = iif(locate('|', genres)>1,left(genres, locate('|',genres)-1) , genres),
		LoadDate = currentDate()) ~> AddNewColumn
AddNewColumn select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		PrimaryGenre,
		year,
		{Rotten Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RearrangeColumns
